request.description:
##### Action Types

| **Action** | **Description** | **Additional Fields** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `CHECK_IN_OVERRIDE` | Manual check-in | `checkInTime` (optional) |
| `CHECK_OUT_OVERRIDE` | Manual ckeck-out | `checkOutTime` (optional) |
| `MARK_ABSENT` | Mark as absent | \-- |
| `STATUS_CHANGE` | Direct status change | `newStatus` |
